歴る: (へる) - to pass/to elapse/to go by; to pass through/to go through; to experience/to go through/to undergo
歴世: (れきせい) - successive generations; successive emperors
歴仕: (れきし) - (successive lords) using the same retainers
歴代: (れきだい) - successive generations; successive emperors
歴代志: (れきだいし) - The Chronicles (books of the Bible)
歴代誌上: (れきだいしじょう) - Chronicles I (book of the Bible)
歴代誌下: (れきだいしか) - Chronicles II (book of the Bible)
歴任: (れきにん) - successive jobs; consecutive jobs
歴史となること: (れきしとなること) - history-making event
歴史のない: (れきしのない) - without a history; historyless; unhistoried; unstoried
歴史の一ページ: (れきしのいちページ) - page in the history books; historical (event); old news
歴史の無い: (れきしのない) - without a history; historyless; unhistoried; unstoried
歴史の１ページ: (れきしのいちページ) - page in the history books; historical (event); old news
歴史は繰り返す: (れきしはくりかえす) - History repeats itself
歴史を刻む: (れきしをきざむ) - to let (feel) time pass
歴史人口学: (れきしじんこうがく) - historical demography
歴史修正主義: (れきししゅうせいしゅぎ) - historical revisionism
歴史再審論者: (れきしさいしんろんしゃ) - revisionist (person who takes a revisionist view of history)
歴史博物館: (れきしはくぶつかん) - history museum
歴史地区: (れきしちく) - historic district; historic center of a town
歴史小説: (れきししょうせつ) - historical novel
歴史時代: (れきしじだい) - historical times; historical period
歴史物語: (れきしものがたり) - historical tale
歴史的仮名遣い: (れきしてきかなづかい) - historical kana usage (as used prior to Japanese government reforms made in 1946)
歴史的現在: (れきしてきげんざい) - historical present
歴史的経緯から: (れきしてきけいいから) - for historical reasons
歴史言語学: (れきしげんごがく) - historical linguistics
歴史認識: (れきしにんしき) - historical awareness; understanding of history
歴史資料: (れきししりょう) - historical records; historical materials
歴史資料館: (れきししりょうかん) - historical archive; library of historical records
歴女: (れきじょ) - young woman strongly interested in pre-Edo history; young woman making use of speech and mannerisms of pre-industrial Japan; female history buff
歴年: (れきねん) - calendar year; civil year; time; year after year
歴日: (れきじつ) - the passing of time
歴朝: (れきちょう) - successive reigns; successive emperors; successive dynasties
歴歴: (れきれき) - notables/dignitaries/illustrious families; (たる adjective) clear/plain/obvious
歴法の改正: (れきほうのかいせい) - calendar reform
歴然: (れきぜん) - evident; plain; distinct; clear
歴程: (れきてい) - a route or passage
歴訪: (れきほう) - round of calls; tour of visitation
歸る: (かえる) - to return/to come home/to go home/to go back; (of a guest, customer, etc.) to leave; {baseb} to get home/to get to home plate
歹偏: (がつへん) - kanji "bare bone" radical at left
死してのちやむ: (ししてのちやむ) - to be determined to do or die; to never give up until one is dead
死してのち已む: (ししてのちやむ) - to be determined to do or die; to never give up until one is dead
死して後已む: (ししてのちやむ) - to be determined to do or die; to never give up until one is dead
死なば諸共: (しなばもろとも) - Die all together; Go to the grave together
死に: (しに) - (ant: 生き・1) dying/death; dead/useless; damned
死にかける: (しにかける) - to be dying; to be about to die; to be close to death
死にぎわ: (しにぎわ) - verge of death; brink of death
死にそう: (しにそう) - at the point of death/almost dead/about to die; at some limit (pain, hunger, etc.)
死にゆく者: (しにゆくもの) - dying person; the dying
死に体: (しにたい) - {sumo} losing posture/falling position from which it is impossible to recover; hopeless situation
死に別れる: (しにわかれる) - to be separated by death
死に場所: (しにばしょ) - place to die; place of death
死に変る: (しにかわる) - to die and be reborn as something else
死に変わる: (しにかわる) - to die and be reborn as something else
死に急ぐ: (しにいそぐ) - to hasten one's death
死に所: (しにどころ) - place of death; place to die
死に掛ける: (しにかける) - to be dying; to be about to die; to be close to death
死に損ない: (しにぞこない) - a person who has escaped death; dotard
死に損なう: (しにそこなう) - to fail to die; to survive; to outlive
死に水: (しにみず) - give water to a dying person; water given to a dying person
死に水を取る: (しにみずをとる) - to wet the lips of a dying person; to attend someone's last moments
